title: Improvised Explosive Device

fields.name: Detonate Effect:
fields.value: - Whoever detonated this draws a copy of each card you ever played this game, with at least one color that this copied.

fields.name: Dud Effect:
fields.value: - One of the cards that this copied a color from is returned to your hand at random.

desc:
Post 1902
- This card is only playable if your previously played cards have a total of at least 3 distinct valid colors.
- When played, this will copy 3 distinct random valid colors from any card(s) you have previously played throughout this game.
- Valid colors include all colors except: <:holy:1120560132150022184> <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> üê∏ <:ex:1118578840529281114> <:explosive:1171223932754473082> <:colorless:1106434944261177374>
